name: Scrambled Warriors
description:
Hatch a plan & take on this egg-streme mission. Rival eggs have taken over the fridge and the kitchen. You must egg-liminate the rotten eggs and smash the boss to win the game. 


Controls:

ESC = See the menu (during battle)
F =Activate fart hover
Space = Jump, and hover up while farting
Left shift = Run
1 = 3rd person view (best for melee battle)
2 = 1st person view (best for ranged battle)
Q = Fire toothpick (while in 1st person, ranged view)
Q = Attack style 1 (while in 3rd person melee battle)
E = Attack style 2 (while in 3rd person melee battle)
Mouse scroll = Zoom in & out

Rated PG.
